re.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used in business letters to introduce the subject
re.translation[0].definitions[0].example: re your enquiry of the 19th October
re.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: the second note in a musical scale
re.translation[2].definitions[1].example: She asked me to redo the essay.
re.translation[2].definitions[2].example: After years of separation they were finally reunited.
re.translation[5].definitions[0].definit: concerning; used in business letters and notes to introduce the subject that you are writing about
re.translation[6].definitions[0].definit: abbreviation for REINSURANCE (=when an insurance company arranges to share a large insurance risk with other companies), often used in the names of reinsurance companies
re.translation[6].definitions[0].example: Munich Re, the world’s biggest reinsurer
